alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 5:45PM CDT until May 10 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Easter, or 10 miles northwest of Dimmitt, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Hereford, Canyon, Mescalero Park, Buffalo Lake, Dawn, Umbarger and Timbercreek Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
